snippet.title: Despot's Game: Dystopian Army Builder - Out Now! | Steam Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Despot's Game now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1227280/Despots_Game_Dystopian_Army_Builder/

FEATURES:

GET READY TO DIE, HUMANS!
Assemble an army and find the way out of Despot's dungeon! Create your team and set them up for battle, then watch the chaos unfold, which allows you to focus heavily on tactical considerations rather than reflexes.

ARM YOUR WARRIORS
Tables, fridges, chainsaws, boxing gloves and stale pretzels…In that terrifying dungeon, you should use whatever you can get your hands on to survive!

TEN UNIQUE CLASSES
From Tanks and Healers to Cultists: find the best class synergies and use tactics to increase your chances of withstanding the onslaught of d'Spots creations!

ENDLESS REPLAYABILITY
The dungeons are procedurally generated from scratch every time. It's a whole new exciting experience each run!

FIGHT OTHER PLAYERS
Fight online against armies of other players and compete in various challenges to prove yourself a champion!

•   •   •

Join other puny humans:

Discord: https://discord.gg/Qa4HxzZfTX
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Despotism_3k
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DespotsGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/despotism3k/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DespotsGame/

#indiegame #indiegames #pixelart #roguelike #DespotsGame #tinyBuild
